title: JupyterCon 2023
description:
Learn more and buy your ticket at https://www.jupytercon.com/.

JupyterCon, May 10-12, is a 3-day conference in Paris, France that brings together data scientists, business analysts, researchers, educators, developers, and core project maintainers for in-depth training, insightful keynotes, networking events, and practical talks exploring the Jupyter ecosystem.
